title: TheOpenLinuxForum_LiveTools DVD
description:
TheOpenLinuxForum_LiveTools DVD is the ultimate in recovery tools. Everything you could ever want in a LiveCD that also is perfect to install on older hardware. Create a bootable USB, burn to a DVD, or install within a virtual machine, TheOpenLinuxForum_LiveTools DVD will become your "go to" recovery media. Think of it as "When Knoppix met Kali". Based and built forward from a Ubuntu 12.04.3 minimal, LiveTools has just what you need and not that resource hungry default environment that you do not.


You can find us on facebook at



The Open Linux Forum
